title: "Homework 5"
---

```{r}

# Load the data, skipping the first row (which contains headers as data)
crime_raw <- read.table("uscrime.txt", header = TRUE)

# Convert all columns to numeric
crime <- as.data.frame(lapply(crime_raw, as.numeric))

#  View structure of the dataset
str(crime)

# Fit full linear regression model
model <- lm(Crime ~ M + So + Ed + Po1 + Po2 + LF + M.F + Pop + NW + 
              U1 + U2 + Wealth + Ineq + Prob + Time, data = crime)

# View model summary
summary(model)

# Define new city data
new_city <- data.frame(
  M = 14.0, So = 0, Ed = 10.0, Po1 = 12.0, Po2 = 15.5,
  LF = 0.640, M.F = 94.0, Pop = 150, NW = 1.1,
  U1 = 0.120, U2 = 3.6, Wealth = 3200, Ineq = 20.1,
  Prob = 0.04, Time = 39.0
)

# Predict crime rate
predicted_crime <- predict(model, newdata = new_city)
print(predicted_crime)
```
